subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After winning the American League pennant on Magglio Ordóñez’s game-ending home run in Game 4 against Oakland on Saturday, the Tigers have a week off before Game 1 of the World Series.
snippet: After winning the American League pennant on Magglio Ordóñez’s game-ending home run in Game 4 against Oakland on Saturday, the Tigers have a week off before Game 1 of the World Series.
